Reviews.Title: “Nice, Clean & Friendly”
Reviews.Author: wilhelmfink
Reviews.Content: greeted reception roberto warm inviting perfect spot close roma termini main station easy walk spanish steps sites rome internet wifi easily available times breakfast stocked lots choose recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great stay for a tight budget!”
Reviews.Author: Izzybird
Reviews.Content: stayed 6 nights found staff helpful friendly hotel close termini republica station met including professional quality hair dryer reception calls printing tickets breakfast provided daily access computer internet charge refrigerator recommending fantastic little restaurant corner course seasons arent paying

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel - with a few minor issues”
Reviews.Author: LeChatGris11
Reviews.Content: staff friendly professional helpful ready assist queries touristy plus referral wonderful restaurant corner recently refurbished carpet vacuum replacement wasnt scratch smelled bad manager kindly upgraded watch dont smoking near actually corridor smell cleaning staff cant life understand people continue smoke manager makes hotel tick true people person hotel management skills 1st september hotel means lot staff try hard stay comfortable plumbing oh dear bidet sink hot water quickly shower 15 minutes warm probably wasnt summer november bit depressing standing waiting hot shower am fault management staff looked quickly shower curtains arent adequate water floors showering adding shower curtain fix dangerous quick cheap fix breakfast improving day experimenting day little food seeing standard european breakfast filling issues coffee horrendous coffee machine sometimes wasnt hot morning departures cook kitchen tasting rid awful coffee machine simple coffee hotel served stale bread sunday morning breakfast bakers strike day appetising overall impression hotel excellent central touristy rome roberto manager dedicated aims please fixing hotel bringing speed imagine budget allowances time permitting id treated fed housed thats holidays isnt

Reviews.Title: “many good points but some organisation problem”
Reviews.Author: Helpyouchoose
Reviews.Content: looked reviews booking windows main building called check booked emailed request recalled request 2 times answered ok arrived available main building 306 front ok reception blamed expect impossible mails phonecalls 2 weeks happy form apologizing mistake clean cleaning lady location perfect breakfast wifi actually nice own keys pass reception everytime elevator dont count

Reviews.Title: “Being in Hotel XX Settembre is always fabolous”
Reviews.Author: peter s
Reviews.Content: 3 november parents stayed time staying therebut roberto overjoyed meet pretty helpful real excellent host offering coffee checkinthe location perfect near market wish peter sz

Reviews.Title: “You'll end up in the street if you book the Settembre hotel”
Reviews.Author: Norman R
Reviews.Content: booked hotel june stay start october arrival front door locked answer phoned hotel spent 100 overseas calls expedia eventually confirmed hotel double booked spent hours sitting suitcases street expedia booked dirtiest hotel rome alternative spending 750 extra six night stay rome explanation apology management book hotel unless appreciate left street distress accommodation country speak language

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff and Great Location!!!”
Reviews.Author: uri777
Reviews.Content: returned 5 nights hotel highly recommend looking relatively cheap hotel location hotel metro stations close hotel maximum 10minute walk hotel walk downtown hotel halfhour walk metro feel city staff kindly breakfast provides coffee bread eggs salami cereals owner hotel doing job enjoy rome

Reviews.Title: “Bed bugs”
Reviews.Author: lleta
Reviews.Content: time traveling europe hotel paris nice hostel florence reasonable hotel disgusting smelled carpet bath tube flood hot water add insult injury woke rash neck didnt time bed bugs expecting little bits instead massive little bits hands legs trip awesome gross tired form tours complain didnt realize bed plane home word wise check bedding sleep

Reviews.Title: “Dreadful!”
Reviews.Author: Mairig
Reviews.Content: dark curtains stay shut overlooked apartments roof top carpet badly stained wore shoes times showerbathroom designed people toiletries kept shelf space tv system didnt airconditioning amenities called couple vending machines lobbyfoyer selling soft drinks crisps etc fridge basic stayed budget city centre hotels london paris toronto worst experience

Reviews.Title: “great for a short break”
Reviews.Author: dcw2467
Reviews.Content: wife managed 3 days children looking forward nice break location hotel 15 minites walk train terminal metro write address struggle due tucked street hotel tiny sign front inside 2nd floor clean sized bed heard previous reports hot water leave shower 5 minutes hot windows balcony door unfortunately reaching views blocks flats surrounding hotel ha ho viewsthe night time quiet noise outside althought hotel breakfast loads eat fun friendly chef odd arguement staff shortage reception excellant providing accurate information train times bus routes information

Reviews.Content: arrival actually wed found wrong hotel website display photos tacky hotel exterior checked road looked block flats located arrival middle block flats horrified tiny bathroom looked hadnt cleaned light hanging ceiling dirty spa bath hair bursting jets thick mold corners bath located residential block flats noise unbearable renovation hammering drilling late evening breakfast hotel look slightly nicer road mistake selection salami stale bread hotel ruined trip rome advise near hotel
